title: f/s: t206 lajoie sgc40s...some hofs left
author: chaddurbin

posts.post_title: f/s: t206 lajoie sgc40s...some hofs left
posts.post_content:
i accept check/mo/paypal gift.

prices include shipping.  time to upgrade, i added the t206 speaker and lajoie

speaker 40...tobacco stain otherwise nice card--SOLD
lajoie...OM back, nice--$300

...or take both for $600



graded...imo all cards look better than tech grade

flick sgc30, a couple short wrinkles on front account for tough grade--$75
davis sgc30...sharp card--$SOLD
wheat sgc30--$82
huggins mouth open bvg 1.5--$40
mcginnity sgc30...looks VG--SOLD
clarke w/bat sgc40--$90   sold

Email sent on T206 Chase and McGinnity

Quan, i ll take Griffith W/Bat.

JB
I'll take the Jennings.  What's the price on the Waddell, or is it sold?  Thanks,  Jim (jlynch@capspart.com)

i think i replied to all emails/pm and have all the cards sorted out.  even if you were too late i still should've sent u something.  please reply/confirm if you got the cards so i'll know as many people wanted the same 6-7 cards.  thanks.

quan

Shucks, I missed out on the Tinker!  Those guys with the funky haircuts always were so popular in my high school.  I guess some things never change.  Thanks for the sale Quan, perhaps next time.

Lovely Day...

bump for addition of speaker/lajoie

(all packages sent out for sold cards)
